title: 1.8 趣味小游戏 To protect the balls命令方块教程
author: maps_of_China
txt_content:
本帖最后由 maps_of_China 于 2016-2-28 18:55 编辑 

  Hey,大家好，一个周末过去了，本人又来发帖喽~~
  这次接着上次的To protect the balls存档介绍，继续给大家带来一部分命令方块的教程。
  教程比较简单，希望对1.8的命令方块初学者有帮助。



教程
------------------------------------
                                     首先先创建几个积分榜，下面讲解：
/scoreboard objectives add item dummy

积分榜item 用于检测物品掉落


/scoreboard objectives add b dummy

积分榜b用于检测玩家和zombie的距离，当玩家和zombie离物品一定距离时就会把物品清空或加分


/scoreboard objectives add Your_score dummy

积分榜Your_score用于显示玩家的分数


/scoreboard objectives add d dummy

积分榜d用于是专门为一个叫做thief的小boss设置的

------------------------------------

再教大家如何让玩家或僵尸离物品一定的距离后给玩家加分并清除物品（难懂是吧？）

 以下指令用高频连上

/execute @a ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Item,score_item_min=1,r=1] b 1

这条指令是把玩家周围1个的凋落物的积分设为1

/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] item 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:slime_ball",Damage:0s},OnGround:1b}

/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] item 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:snowball",Damage:0s},OnGround:1b}

这两条指令意思是把落在地上的雪球或史莱姆球的item积分设为1


当一个掉落物品的itme积分和b积分同时为一时，会给玩家加分。


检测雪球和史莱姆球的掉落在地上：

/testfor @e[type=Item,score_item_min=1,score_b_min=1] {Item:{id:"minecraft:slime_ball",Damage:0s},OnGround:1b}

/testfor @e[type=Item,score_item_min=1,score_b_min=1] {Item:{id:"minecraft:snowball",Damage:0s},OnGround:1b}


红色比较器连上两个命令方块


如图：

比较器后面的命令方块输出：

/scoreboard players add @p Your_score 1

给玩家分数榜加分

清除离玩家1格的物品：

/kill @e[type=Item,score_b_min=1]

播放音效：

/playsound note.harp @a ~ ~ ~ 15 1 1

注：两个比较器后的命令方块都是输出这3条指令


下面是僵尸偷物品的指令，高频连上

/execute @e[type=Zombie] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Item,score_item_min=1,r=1] b 2

意思是只要僵尸离掉落物的距离有1格就会把物品的b积分设为2

下面就是杀死b积分=2的物品：

/execute @e[type=Item,score_b_min=2] ~ ~ ~ /kill @e[type=Item,score_b_min=2]

这样僵尸一但靠近掉落物就会把物品清除


以上是就是让玩家或僵尸离物品一定的距离后给玩家加分并清除物品的命令方块教程


------------------------------------
接下是召唤物品的教程
比较简单

/summon Item -801 3 -1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:slime_ball",Damage:0s},CustomName:"1"}

/summon Villager -801 8 -1 {NoAI:1,Invulnerable:1b,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:99999},{Id:20,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:99999}],Silent:1b,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1}],CustomName:"1",CustomNameVisible:1}

召唤了史莱姆球和村民，村民是勾引僵尸的（现在僵尸会扑向凋落物的原理懂了吧？）
这种指令有6个，基本差不多，不一一列举了

开启刷物品的随机器：
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {MinSpawnDelay:485,MaxSpawnDelay:570,SpawnCount:1,Delay:405,RequiredPlayerRange:100,MaxNearbyEntities:1,SpawnRange:1,EntityId:FallingSand,SpawnPotentials:[{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,36.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:2},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,34.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,32.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,30.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:4}]}

高频连上下面一条指令：


/testfor @e[type=Item,name=1]

检测物品的存在

信号反转：


/kill @e[type=Villager,name=1]

杀死对应物品头上的村民，僵尸就不会再往掉落物刷出的地方走了

因为上面对应的刷物品点有6个，所以以上2条指令也有6组，不相同，不一一列举了，不懂的同学可以来下载存档研究一下

------------------------------------
下面教刷怪的指令，挺简单


刷出地图中的3只脑残僵尸：
3只脑残僵尸，它们把球球偷走：













/summon Zombie -803 3 8 {CustomName:"Zombie",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:285},{},{},{},{id:397,tag:{display:{color:9868950},ench:[{id:7,lvl:2}]}}]}

/summon Zombie -778 3 0 {CustomName:"Zombie",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:267},{},{},{},{id:397,tag:{display:{color:9868950},ench:[{id:7,lvl:2}]}}]}

/summon Zombie -796 3 -8 {CustomName:"Zombie",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:277},{},{},{},{id:397,tag:{display:{color:9868950},ench:[{id:7,lvl:2}]}}]}

开启刷僵尸和掉落物（作者懒得整理了）的随机器：
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {MinSpawnDelay:105,MaxSpawnDelay:195,SpawnCount:1,Delay:110,RequiredPlayerRange:100,MaxNearbyEntities:1,SpawnRange:1,EntityId:FallingSand,SpawnPotentials:[{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,28.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:2},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,26.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,24.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,22.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:4}]}


------------------------------------
然后教大家如何实现靠近小BOSS thief会中负增益状态：

/execute @a ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,name=Thief,rm=2] d 0

当玩家靠近thief 2格以内时，把它的d积分设为1

然后当thief的积分=1时，给玩家附加负增益效果：

/execute @e[score_d_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /effect @a 15 5 2 true

/execute @e[score_d_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /effect @a 15 5 2 true

/execute @e[score_d_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /effect @a 9 10 10 true

效果是反胃，失明，缓慢。

当玩家离thief不足2格时，把thief的分数设为0

/execute @a ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,name=Thief,rm=2] d 0


------------------------------------

下面是教刷出特殊怪物的指令，比较基础：

  倒立闪电爬行者，它们头上顶着史莱姆球，把它击败后会掉落史莱姆球。但是它的威力是巨大的：



/summon Item -793 3 2 {Riding:{id:Bat,Invulnerable:1b,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:99999}],Silent:1b,Riding:{id:Creeper,CustomName:"Grumm",powered:1}},Item:{id:341,Count:8},PickupDelay:1000000000,Age:-32768}

意思就是一个史莱姆球骑着一只骑着闪电苦力怕的蝙蝠



生气的苦力怕，不是特别危险，但是你得离它远点：


/summon Creeper -793 3 2 {ExplosionRadius:2,Fuse:5,CustomName:"Angry_Creeper",CustomNameVisible:1}
简单不多说

粒子效果（高频）

/execute @e[type=Creeper,name=Angry_Creeper] ~ ~ ~ /particle dripLava ~ ~1 ~ 1 0 1 0.2 4 @e[type=Creeper,name=Angry_Creeper]

/execute @e[type=Creeper,name=Angry_Creeper] ~ ~ ~ /particle lava ~ ~1 ~ 0 1 0 0.7 1 @e[type=Creeper,name=Angry_Creeper]




EnderCreeper,移动速度超快的苦力怕：




/summon Creeper -793 3 2 {ExplosionRadius:2,Fuse:10,CustomName:"Ender_Creeper",CustomNameVisible:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:0.4}]}


粒子效果（高频）

/execute @e[type=Creeper,name=Ender_Creeper] ~ ~ ~ /particle portal ~ ~1 ~ 0 1 0 0.2 5 @e[type=Creeper,name=Ender_Creeper]


倒雪人，它会向玩家主动发起进攻，打死后会掉落雪球









/summon Skeleton -793 4 2 {CustomName:"gg",CustomNameVisible:1,Invulnerable:1b,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:99999}],Silent:1b}

/summon Item -793 4 2 {Riding:{id:Bat,Invulnerable:1b,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:99999}],Silent:1b,Riding:{id:SnowMan,CustomName:"Grumm",NoAI:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:50}]}},Item:{id:332,Count:8},PickupDelay:1000000000,Age:-32768}

SKELETON是攻击实体，倒雪人没有AI

tp大法，把雪人tp至skeleton（高频）


/tp @e[type=SnowMan] @e[type=Skeleton,name=gg]




SlimeBoy,头顶骑着一个倒小白，进行远程输出：









/summon Skeleton -793 4 2 {CustomName:"Grumm",CustomNameVisible:0,Size:3,Equipment:[{id:261,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:1},{id:48,lvl:1}]}},{},{},{},{id:95,Damage:5,tag:{display:{color:9868950}}}],Riding:{id:Slime,Size:3,CustomName:"SlimeBoy",CustomNameVisible:1}}
简单不多说


僵尸Thief,算是一个小Boss了。当你离它3格内你会中一个迟缓，失明和反胃的效果并且也会偷走雪球和史莱姆球。











/summon Zombie -793 3 2 {CustomName:"Thief",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{},{id:301,tag:{display:{color:9868950}}},{id:300,tag:{display:{color:0}}},{id:299,tag:{display:{color:0}}},{id:95,Damage:15,tag:{display:{color:0},ench:[{id:7,lvl:2}]}}],Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:36},{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:1}]}
没什么特殊，基本summon指令

以上就是在游戏中刷的怪。千万要保护好雪球和史莱姆球，因为僵尸们会趁你不备把它们偷走。


开启刷怪随机器：
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {MinSpawnDelay:105,MaxSpawnDelay:125,SpawnCount:1,Delay:110,RequiredPlayerRange:100,MaxNearbyEntities:1,SpawnRange:1,EntityId:FallingSand,SpawnPotentials:[{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,20.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:2},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,18.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,16.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-803.5,2.0,14.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:4},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-807.5,2.0,14.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-807.5,2.0,16.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[-807.5,2.0,18.5],Time:50,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block"},Weight:1}]}
-----------------------------------
最后是your_score积分榜的指令

简单难度时你得吃到15个球，普通难度需要吃到25个球，困难难度需要吃到40个球！
一个球就是your_score积分榜的一分

使用fill指令fill一个空的命令方块(高频）

简单：/blockdata -794 2 28 {Command:"/testfor @a[score_Your_score_min=15]"}

普通：/blockdata -794 2 28 {Command:"/testfor @a[score_Your_score_min=25]"}

困难：/blockdata -794 2 28 {Command:"/testfor @a[score_Your_score_min=40]"}


一旦玩家分数达标，命令方块就会检测到
在命令方块后用比较器连上（下面就不重要了，可以跳过）
/tp @p -803 3 45

summon FireworksRocime:0,FireworksItem:{id:401,Count:1,tag:{Fireworks:{Explosions:ketEntity -800 3 43 {LifeT[{Flicker:4,Trail:1,Type:4,Colors:[16716055,255,3026478],FadeColors:[845505336,1986319,16729674]},{Flicker:4,Trail:1,Type:4,Colors:[0,6836616,8687951],FadeColors:[65344,1671168,16776960]},{Flicker:8,Trail:0,Type:3,Colors:[16711680,0],FadeColors:[6955159,4247567,65280]},{Flicker:8,Trail:1,Type:0,Colors:[4227200,0],FadeColors:[16744703,16711680,65280]},{Flicker:20,Trail:0,Type:1,Colors:[7403598,16578646,255],FadeColors:[367215,65380,16711680]}]}}},Motion:[0.0,0.1,0.0]}
烟花

/title @p title {text:"Thanks for play",color:"red",bold:"true",italic:true}
